PromtEngineer/localGPT

LocalGPT lets you chat with your own files using a private AI on your computer

View on index

Related repos

  • ChatGPT desktop app for Mac, Windows, and Linux
  • local AI agents that chat and run code on your device
  • RAG platform for chat with documents via multi-provider AI
  • Chatbox: open-source chat app for local AI or custom models
  • AI tool for chatting with and analyzing your data using natural language; works with files and databases, keeps data on your device
  • mac app for chatting with local AI that searches your files and web
  • ChatGPT-based tools for hacking and security testing
  • Client-side JavaScript library for ChatGPT interaction
  • Voice chat using WebGPU in a browser
